title: What should out updated issuance schedule be?
body:
Forum Post / Discussion: https://gov.metafactory.ai/t/proposal-3-updating-the-robot-issuance-schedule/96

Since we crossed the $100k sales milestone, ROBOT issuance for buyers  dropped from 0.4 ROBOT/$ to 0.2 ROBOT/$. However, with the upcoming Curation Game, we are introducing a new pool of “curator rewards”, and it makes sense for these tokens to be reallocated from the buyer pool.

From the forum thread, these are the proposed choices:

**Option 1:** 0.05 buyer reward, designers > curators (15k and 10k  ROBOT per milestone respectively)
**Option 2:** 0.05 buyer reward, designers = curators (12.5k ROBOT per milestone each)
**Option 3:** 0.1 buyer reward, designers = curators (10k ROBOT per milestone each)

The Ops/Gov and TBD allocations will not be changing with this vote
